turn.2: SM U-27 (Germany) SM "U-27" was a German Type "U-27" U-boat built for service in the Imperial German Navy.
turn.4: She was launched on 14 July 1913, and commissioned on 8 May 1914 with Kapitänleutnant Bernd Wegener in command.
turn.5: Did it have any notable battles?
turn.6: On 18 October 1914, the British submarine was torpedoed and sunk in the North Sea by "U-27".
turn.8: This was the first action in which one submarine sank another.
